name: RN apps: Public / Archived drop-down is not visible if set to false
precondition:
Important

Ensure that `Allow users to view archived channels` is enabled on the server and some public and private archived channels exist
(Setting can be found in System Console under "Users and Teams")

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
RN Public / Archived drop-down is not visible if set to false
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. In system Console set `Allow users to view archived channels:` to False
  2. Login to the server from RN
  3. Select the More... option to open the channel modal
inline.expectedResult: • User should not have an option to use Archived Channels drop-down

customFields.Related ticket(s): RN - Archived channel drop down is visible in More... Modal when Archived Channels are disabled — MM-20762
